backend/main.mo: Defines actor state, types, maps, and helper validation/authorization utilities for orders, users, designs, and activity logging.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, impacted files, components, tests, and confidence ratings for recent fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of major frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with light/dark design tokens and global styling variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, network strategies, and versioned cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and bootstrap flow handling identity, role checks, error screens, and dashboard routing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user attempts to access unauthorized pages with a redirect button.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Displays a blocked-user message and allows the user to log out and clear cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Shows an error screen for profile loading failures with retry and logout actions and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for existing sessions and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Informs authenticated users without a profile and lets them copy their principal ID and refresh the page.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time admin users to enter a name and trigger initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Restricts access to children based on effective app role, showing loading or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table of design image mappings with design code, name, image status, and creation date.
Dialog that loads and displays a design image with loading, error, and not-found states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Error boundary that shows a friendly error screen with details and allows page reload or logout.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing technical error details with a copy-to-clipboard action.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert with optional technical details and retry button, handling stopped-canister messages.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Provides export dropdown for CSV and per-karigar PDF/JPEG exports based on filtered orders and date.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Exports a single karigar's daily or total orders as PDF or JPEG with scoped options.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: Offers UI controls to filter orders by date or design and trigger PDF/JPEG exports.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Displays detailed karigar order info in a dialog with option to view design image.
Defines main app layout with role-based navigation, header, and mobile/desktop menus.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Form dialog for creating or editing master design mappings and saving them to backend.
Dialog for uploading and parsing master design files, showing parse results and importing new or updated designs.
Displays a table of master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Scrollable table previewing ingested orders, highlighting unmapped designs and PDF-sourced karigars.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Warning banner showing skipped invalid orders and providing a button to clear cached data.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Filter bar for orders allowing search, date, karigar, status, and CO-only filtering.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Full orders table with selection, actions, status display, and sanitized order handling.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog for entering partial quantities for RB orders with validation before confirmation.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog for editing an order’s total supplied quantity with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Shows backend reachability status with refresh, canister ID display, and error details.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and pending offline sync queue with manual sync control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs a backend health check and classifies errors to report online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with success/error status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile via actor with error classification and conditional retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Computes the effective app role by combining user profile data with backend admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend orders, sanitizes cached data, and exposes loading, error, and cache-clearing helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, sanitizing, and persisting orders and related data, plus utilities for batched uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeout, optional authenticated initialization, and safe retry behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates printable HTML/PDF exports of karigar orders with metadata and summaries, supporting iOS fallback.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by export type and generates downloadable CSV files with formatted fields.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, resolving generic and karigar names and reporting unmapped designs.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits orders into equally sized batches and validates batch size.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate and per-karigar order metrics after sanitization.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Normalizes karigar names for display, returning 'Unassigned' when empty.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Generates a deterministic karigar PO code from a name using the first three letters and appending 01, defaulting to UNA01 for empty or unassigned names.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns a Date for an order using uploadDate if present, otherwise createdAt, converting nanoseconds to milliseconds.
Checks if an order type string contains 'co' to classify customer orders.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sanitizes and sorts orders by normalized designCode and then by orderNo.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sanitizes and sorts orders by formatted karigar name, then normalized designCode, then orderNo.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Validates PersistentOrder objects and filters invalid ones, returning valid entries and a skipped count.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses an Excel file to extract design codes, generic names, and image URLs with validation for required fields.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design mappings from a workbook using flexible header matching and outputs designCode-to-entry tuples.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel sheet with flexible column detection, numeric validation, and customer‑order detection.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads SheetJS if needed and reads an Excel file into a workbook with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Routes master design file parsing to PDF or Excel handlers and wraps both with user‑friendly error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files by detecting PDF or Excel format and delegating to the appropriate parser with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js from CDN and extracts per-page text grouped into lines using positional data.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses flattened PDF text lines into master design entries by detecting a header and extracting design, generic, and karigar fields.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses PDF order lines, first trying table-row format with karigar column, then falling back to section-header mode.
Parses a single table-style order line with explicit karigar, validating formats and returning a full order object.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Provides IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, a sync queue, and related CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Implements offline sync logic to upload queued orders, track progress, and update state and queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard that loads orders, applies tab-specific filters, manages cache, and provides dialogs for editing and exporting order data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Page for uploading, parsing, validating, and saving design image mappings from Excel files.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Interface for listing, searching, adding, editing, and importing master design mappings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Admin UI for creating users, managing approvals, and blocking or unblocking user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Karigar-facing dashboard showing active orders with approval gating, bulk updates, viewing, and export options.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page UI with branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: One-time setup page for initializing the first admin using a bootstrap token.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles uploading, parsing, mapping, previewing, and batch‑uploading orders with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays staff dashboards with tabs, filtering, metrics, order tables, and dialogs for fulfillment and edits.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Shows unmapped design codes with search, grouping, and a dialog to create new master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates, and logs lifecycle events.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors, detecting stopped canister and network issues, and extracts safe diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Converts errors into user‑friendly messages using bootstrap classification and basic message decoding.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing) and storing, retrieving, and clearing values in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn't resolve within the given duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and existing feature requirements for the KarigarFlow project.
